title: FS Chance, Bresnahan, Bender, Waddell, etc...
author: JCC

posts.post_title: FS Chance, Bresnahan, Bender, Waddell, etc...
posts.post_content:
"I'll take it" takes precedence over any ongoing negotiations. All prices are DLVD. ppff or check/money order accepted.

Roger Bresnahan - Portrait - Piedmont - $80
Frank Chance - Portrait (yellow background) - Sweet Caporal - SOLD
Rube Waddell - Throwing - Piedmont - SOLD 
Chief Bender - Portrait - Piedmont - SOLD
Ed Reulbach - No Glove - Old Mill - $80
Fred Tenney - Portrait - Sweet Caporal - $45
Hal Chase - Holding Trophy (double name top and bottom) - Piedmont - $75
Matty McIntyre - Portrait (great color) - Piedmont - $80 PENDING
Waddell sold.  Price drops for the rest.
